def show
  <a href='https://github.com/widget' class='user-mention'>@widget</a> = Widget(params[:id])
  respond_to do |format|
    format.html # show.html.erb
    format.json { render json: <a href='https://github.com/widget' class='user-mention'>@widget</a> }
  end
end
